website_summaries.verdict: People who are in search of an exceedingly comfortable mountaineering boot, one that doesn’t disappoint when it comes to climbing performance may look no further as Salewa’s Rapace GTX more than fits the bill. It is also a footgear with surprising lightness and true-to-size fit. Sadly, some users smear the boot’s rather flawless resume by decrying its letdown of a waterproofing feature. Overall, barring its disappointing water protection, the Rapace GTX has a lot going for it that puts it on quite a lofty pedestal.
pros: Droves of users praised the Salewa Rapace GTX for its superior lightness
This boot impressed dozens of mountaineers with its jaw-dropping comfort
One of them linked this amazing level of comfort to the boot’s ability to flex during transitions
Quite a number of wearers raved about the Rapace GTX’s true-to-size fit
Some owners were delighted to find out about this boot’s almost non-existent break-in period
They used the boot straight out of the box and, after covering a few miles, came back blister free
The Salewa Rapace GTX’s climbing performance is simply extraordinary, based on a few user reviews
The overall sturdiness of this boot impressed a few owners
Evident to this quality durability is the footwear’s layered upper, complete with a full-on rubber rand
A small percentage of users applauded this boot’s crampon connection for working surprisingly well with their aftermarket crampons
A couple of customers felt compelled to give the Rapace GTX great remarks for its excellent ankle support
cons: According to a very few, this boot’s waterproofing feature is criminally underwhelming
One of them said his feet got wet for merely walking through some wet bushes
A hiking blogger felt betrayed after discovering the shoe’s outsole has worn out too quickly

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, quality walking boots
customer_reviews.text: Fit straight out of the box, size was spot on a 43 (size 9 UK). The sole is quite rigid which is what I needed and they seem weatherproof. I've yet to test this out by spending all day out in the wet but they handled walking through a stream without any soggy socks. All in all a quality boot at an OK-ish price. I hope they last as long as my last pair of boots (Salomon) which have just started to let in water after 10 years!
customer_reviews.author: David Fairhurst

customer_reviews.title: Great boots at a terrific price
customer_reviews.text: I'm always slightly worried about ordering shoes/boots online given the variability in fit between brands (i.e. the same "size" in one brand will seem larger or smaller than in another brand). However these were spot on and surprisingly comfortable right out of the box given how stiff and sold a boot they are.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart L Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Good boots but the description was deceptive/wrong
customer_reviews.text: The boots feel sturdy with a good stiff sole that was what I was after. My biggest complaint is that boots are sold as a synthetic outer which they are not. Don't trust the description like I did if the details matter.
customer_reviews.author: Britesponge

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, supportive boot.
customer_reviews.text: Great boots very supportive and comfortable. I haven’t been out in wet conditions to review how waterproof they are. I am a normal width size 8, they do feel a bit tight across my foot, possibly should’ve went for a half size up, but hopefully they will stretch a bit. Otherwise quite happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh McAulay

customer_reviews.title: even better than i expected
customer_reviews.text: Have had a pair of Salewa walking shoes for years which were super comfy hence the risk was low on the boots. Have to be honest - these are way better than expected! Super comfy from the get go and surprisingly lightweight for 'stiff' sole books.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: I feel really disappointed of the quality of the item
customer_reviews.text: I feel really disappointed of the quality of the item! during the two trip i've done in this boots i had to repaired it twice!! Once on the front bit the thread wasn't strong enough to hold the two parts together second the inner layer at the ankle torn apart! I expected more from a Salewa maybe because of the previous good experiences with they products.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Csaba Mathe

customer_reviews.title: Fit, Comfort, Stability
customer_reviews.text: Fitted my usual insoles and went into the hills for some boulder hopping and scrambling. Great straight out of the box. I buy one size up and have wide feet. All good. Stiff sole, grippy and light for this type of mountain boot. I haven't yet carried heavy loads but already pretty confident that this will be a great boot for distance hiking in rough terrain. let's see if I'm right.
customer_reviews.author: PETE B

customer_reviews.title: Quality boot
customer_reviews.text: I like the style, fit and comfort. I’ve found the brand to be a little different to others and really pleased I stumbled across them via Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie H

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Have always wanted a pair of these boots,finally I have them.The best I've had.They feel stiff,comfortable,very waterproof and ready to face worst paths and rocky trails.They are TRUE TO SIZE(just follow the size chart) Thank You Salewa for excellent product and good price !
customer_reviews.author: Arman Galstyan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and comfortable as. First walk a little tight for the first hour but loosened off and extremely comfortable. No pinching or blisters anywhere. Ankle support a nice balance between flexibility and support
customer_reviews.author: Hawkman69

customer_reviews.title: Eroding already!!!
customer_reviews.text: After just around 10 miles of walking in them the base of the boots have started to erode. Seems like a poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Qadir Ali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Iam very happy with the fitting of this boots. Exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: GA

product_meta.title: Salewa Men's Ms Rapace Gore-tex High Rise Hiking Shoes
feature_bullets: Recommended use: even on bad paths and trails, worst paths or even away, debris, climbing, glaciers, mixed alpine terrain, mud/grass, rocky/technical paths, crampons compatible.
Attention size selection: please pay attention to our size chart and instructions to choose the right shoe size.
